name: Ext_R4_ProdCharacteristic
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ProdCharacteristic for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ProdCharacteristic from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProdCharacteristic|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The marketing status describes the date when a medicinal product is actually put on the market or the date as of which it is no longer available
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProdCharacteristic from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProdCharacteristic|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Where applicable, the height can be specified using a numerical value and its unit of measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProdCharacteristic.height from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProdCharacteristic|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.
